# Address Bind Fronten

example frontend code for address bind.


```bash
npm install

npm start
```

### example

const isNeuron = true;

```
$ npm start
time now:  1764153353212
bind info:  0x5d0000000c00000055000000490000001000000030000000310000009bd7e06f3ecf4be0f2fcd2188b23f1b9fcc88e5d4b65a8637b17723bbda3cce80114000000dc3ff72c77f90a034b69b593f6b339ced1d85de8fce3bbbf9a010000
sig json:  {"signature":"0xbff6442c611c374a8aa78a7478064f60604aa050e13514a243ed3c1886e3e60078d1931505bffa95842eca55b4485297f286383538f0cb3e47121eead1a867bb00","identity":"0x033c158382c249e79fde591ac3542afc08395fdf0e3ca73587958cbe446d431a6d","signType":"CkbSecp256k1"}
for neuron
sig:  0xbff6442c611c374a8aa78a7478064f60604aa050e13514a243ed3c1886e3e60078d1931505bffa95842eca55b4485297f286383538f0cb3e47121eead1a867bb00
bind info with sig:  
tx:  {"version":"0x0","cellDeps":[{"outPoint":{"txHash":"0xf8de3bb47d055cdf460d93a2a6e1b05f7432f9777c8c474abf4eec1d4aee5d37","index":"0x0"},"depType":"depGroup"}],"headerDeps":[],"inputs":[{"previousOutput":{"txHash":"0xd3fcc2f37a54424fdbf0abfcc8fdfcf4e336f1850f42faea2446dd8cddb8f9f4","index":"0x0"},"since":"0x0","cellOutput":{"capacity":"0xa97f3894e","lock":{"codeHash":"0x9bd7e06f3ecf4be0f2fcd2188b23f1b9fcc88e5d4b65a8637b17723bbda3cce8","hashType":"type","args":"0xdc3ff72c77f90a034b69b593f6b339ced1d85de8"}},"outputData":"0x"}],"outputs":[{"capacity":"0xa97f35b3c","lock":{"codeHash":"0x9bd7e06f3ecf4be0f2fcd2188b23f1b9fcc88e5d4b65a8637b17723bbda3cce8","hashType":"type","args":"0xdc3ff72c77f90a034b69b593f6b339ced1d85de8"}}],"outputsData":["0x"],"witnesses":[""]}
The transaction hash is 0x7995bbc2169a54cfeb71d688d735f9f77f11128a614bc77cf3334829c226c862
```

verify bind info with sig

```
$ address-bind-be verify -t 0x7995bbc2169a54cfeb71d688d735f9f77f11128a614bc77cf3334829c226c862
tx 7995bbc2169a54cfeb71d688d735f9f77f11128a614bc77cf3334829c226c862 has valid bind info, from: ckt1qzda0cr08m85hc8jlnfp3zer7xulejywt49kt2rr0vthywaa50xwsqwu8lmjcalepgp5k6d4j0mtxwww68v9m6qz0q8ah, to: ckt1qzda0cr08m85hc8jlnfp3zer7xulejywt49kt2rr0vthywaa50xwsqwu8lmjcalepgp5k6d4j0mtxwww68v9m6qz0q8ah, timestamp: 1764153353212
```

const isNeuron = true;

```
$ npm start
time now:  1764153380917
bind info:  0x5d0000000c00000055000000490000001000000030000000310000009bd7e06f3ecf4be0f2fcd2188b23f1b9fcc88e5d4b65a8637b17723bbda3cce80114000000dc3ff72c77f90a034b69b593f6b339ced1d85de83550bcbf9a010000
sig json:  {"signature":"0xef163a9c3a55d21234c90d27ef79a05b8e038df1f37e06775421c29707f8ebe6511cd0bdc01fcc5bca70c4e6d2399c72d57e741dae050a6b89548abbe451fabd01","identity":"0x033c158382c249e79fde591ac3542afc08395fdf0e3ca73587958cbe446d431a6d","signType":"CkbSecp256k1"}
for non-neuron
sig:  
is verified:  true
from addr:  ckt1qzda0cr08m85hc8jlnfp3zer7xulejywt49kt2rr0vthywaa50xwsqwu8lmjcalepgp5k6d4j0mtxwww68v9m6qz0q8ah
sig json decoded:  {"signature":"0xef163a9c3a55d21234c90d27ef79a05b8e038df1f37e06775421c29707f8ebe6511cd0bdc01fcc5bca70c4e6d2399c72d57e741dae050a6b89548abbe451fabd01","identity":"0x033c158382c249e79fde591ac3542afc08395fdf0e3ca73587958cbe446d431a6d","signType":"CkbSecp256k1"}
bind info with sig:  
tx:  {"version":"0x0","cellDeps":[{"outPoint":{"txHash":"0xf8de3bb47d055cdf460d93a2a6e1b05f7432f9777c8c474abf4eec1d4aee5d37","index":"0x0"},"depType":"depGroup"}],"headerDeps":[],"inputs":[{"previousOutput":{"txHash":"0x7995bbc2169a54cfeb71d688d735f9f77f11128a614bc77cf3334829c226c862","index":"0x0"},"since":"0x0","cellOutput":{"capacity":"0xa97f35b3c","lock":{"codeHash":"0x9bd7e06f3ecf4be0f2fcd2188b23f1b9fcc88e5d4b65a8637b17723bbda3cce8","hashType":"type","args":"0xdc3ff72c77f90a034b69b593f6b339ced1d85de8"}},"outputData":"0x"}],"outputs":[{"capacity":"0xa97f32d2a","lock":{"codeHash":"0x9bd7e06f3ecf4be0f2fcd2188b23f1b9fcc88e5d4b65a8637b17723bbda3cce8","hashType":"type","args":"0xdc3ff72c77f90a034b69b593f6b339ced1d85de8"}}],"outputsData":["0x"],"witnesses":[""]}
The transaction hash is 0x2d95412f1a6c85f37860aec4b27c5d2fd248a9dcc320323ea27f09d0501c1644
```

verify bind info with sig

```
$ address-bind-be verify -t 0x2d95412f1a6c85f37860aec4b27c5d2fd248a9dcc320323ea27f09d0501c1644
tx 2d95412f1a6c85f37860aec4b27c5d2fd248a9dcc320323ea27f09d0501c1644 has valid bind info, from: ckt1qzda0cr08m85hc8jlnfp3zer7xulejywt49kt2rr0vthywaa50xwsqwu8lmjcalepgp5k6d4j0mtxwww68v9m6qz0q8ah, to: ckt1qzda0cr08m85hc8jlnfp3zer7xulejywt49kt2rr0vthywaa50xwsqwu8lmjcalepgp5k6d4j0mtxwww68v9m6qz0q8ah, timestamp: 1764153380917
```
